name: Close CRM
description: Integrate with Close CRM to list, create, search and more.
author: agenticmail

tools.name: List Leads
tools.description: List leads from Close CRM with optional pagination.

tools.name: Create Lead
tools.description: Create a new lead in Close CRM. Provide a name and optional contacts, custom fields, and status.

tools.name: Search Leads
tools.description: Search leads in Close CRM using a query string. Supports Close search syntax.

tools.name: Create Activity
tools.description: Create an activity (note, call, or email) on a Close CRM lead.

tools.name: List Opportunities
tools.description: List opportunities from Close CRM with optional filtering by lead or status.
